data.message: Hate the repeated things over and over again..I know I've got friends saying things and posting pics..I really don't want to see the same thing show up on my news feed day after day...even weather warnings from 2 days ago will show up again...fed up with it and I know others are too

replies.message: Hi, Elizabeth. If you feel you're missing stories you'd like to see or seeing stories in your News Feed that you don't want to see, you can use the different News Feed controls to adjust your preferences. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/2cXQ2zT. -Rhea
Already did that but it's still showing the same posts and ads I've seen over and over..friends say they've noticed the same thing
I'm irritated with it too! I have to go to each friends page to see new things. Smh
